original_text: I ask you too, my true friend, please help these two women to agree together. They have worked with me to tell people the good news. They have worked very hard to help me. They worked together with Clement, and with the other people who helped me in the work. All those workers' names are written in God's book of life.
korean_text: 또 참으로 나와 멍에를 같이한 네게 구하노니 복음에 나와 함께 힘쓰던 저 여인들을 돕고 또한 글레멘드와 그 외에 나의 동역자들을 도우라 그 이름들이 생명책에 있느니라

sentences.original_text: I ask you too, my true friend
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나의 진실한 친구인 당신에게도 부탁합니다

sentences.original_text: please help these two women to agree together
sentences.korean_translation: 이 두 여인이 함께 화합하도록 도와주세요

sentences.original_text: They have worked with me to tell people the good news
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들에게 복음을 전하기 위해 나와 함께 일했습니다

sentences.original_text: They have worked very hard to help me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나를 돕기 위해 매우 열심히 일했습니다

sentences.original_text: and with the other people who helped me in the work
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 일에서 나를 도왔던 다른 사람들과도 함께 일했습니다

sentences.original_text: All those workers' names are written in God's book of life
sentences.korean_translation: 그 모든 일꾼들의 이름이 하나님의 생명책에 기록되어 있습니다
